title: Fisher-Price DC Batwheels 1:55 Scale Toy Cars 5-Pack, Bam Batmobile Redbird Prank Bibi & Quizz, Batcast Metal Diecast Vehicles, Ages 3+
descriptions:
Get ready for high-speed superhero action with the Fisher-Price DC Batwheels 1:55 Scale Toy Cars 5-Pack! This incredible set includes five iconic Batwheels vehicles: Bam the Batmobile, Redbird, Prank, Bibi, and Quizz. Each car is crafted from durable Batcast Metal diecast, ensuring they're ready for countless adventures and races.

With working wheels, these vehicles are perfect for imaginative play and storytelling, encouraging kids to create their own superhero vs. super-villain racing action. The 1:55 scale is perfect for little hands and big imaginations.

For even more fun, this set is compatible with the Batwheels Race and Launch Batcave playset (sold separately, subject to availability). The recommended age for this product is 3 years and older.

Don't miss out on this must-have collection for any Batwheels fan. Order your Fisher-Price DC Batwheels 1:55 Scale Toy Cars 5-Pack today and let the races begin!
